message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product. I'm asking for $175 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but how about $140?  It's a fair price for both of us.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $110 just isn't going to work for me. I'm willing to be flexible, but how about $130?  This would be a great price for you, and I'd still be able to make a decent profit.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
